problem_text: The area of trapezoid J K L M is 138 square feet. The area of trapezoid Q R S T is 5.52 square feet. If trapezoid J K L M \sim trapezoid Q R S T, find the value of x.
compact_text: The area of trapezoid JKLM is 138 square feet. The area of trapezoid QRST is 5.52 square feet. If trapezoid JKLM \sim trapezoid QRST, find the value of x.
annotat_text: The area of trapezoid $JKLM$ is 138 square feet. The area of trapezoid $QRST$ is 5.52 square feet. If trapezoid $J K L M$ $ \sim$ trapezoid $QRST$, find the value of $x$.
